EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SOUTHERN IONIAN SEA.
14 METER M/V ZOE, WHITE HULL, FIVE PERSONS ON BOARD,
ADRIFT DUE TO STEERING PROBLEM IN 36-35N 021-20E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO JRCC PIRAEUS,
TELEX: 601211588, 601211254,
PHONE: 3021 0413 2398, 3021 0422 0772,
FAX: 3021 0413 2398, 3021 0411 5798.
